scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible credit scoring API.  The attacker leverages a model inversion attack to infer protected attributes like income and address by repeatedly querying the API with carefully crafted inputs and observing the output scores.
initial_goal: Develop a profile of high-value customers for targeted marketing.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A credit scoring API is publicly accessible (though intended for internal use only) and provides a creditworthiness score based on customer data.  The attacker is attempting to infer sensitive customer data.
